block.p: BUCHALTER-Sally (Robin). 82, of Monroe Township, NJ, and Coconut Creek, FL (formerly of Brooklyn), on December 9, 2000. Wife of the late Sidney. Mother of Alice Buchalter and Madelyn and Bruce Donoff. Sister of Margaret Margolis and the late Benjamin Robin. Grandmother of Elizabeth and Daniel Donoff. Contributions may be made to: Hadassah or National Jewish Hospital (Denver). For information, contact Mount Sinai Memorial Chapels, East Brunswick, NJ.
